targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="restarter"} | json | level = `INFO` | msg = `pod deleted` | name =~ `^transmission.*` [$__auto]))
sum by (title, user, player, mode, videoCodec, location) (mediamon_plex_session_count)
max by (title, user, player, mode, videoCodec, location) (mediamon_plex_session_count)
